meanings.sent1: She miscomputes the total every time she adds up the numbers.
meanings.sent2: He often miscomputes when doing math homework.
meanings.sent3: The robot miscomputes the answers and gives funny results.
meanings.sent4: His mind miscomputes the numbers like a broken calculator.
meanings.sent5: The student's tendency to miscompute made her double-check every calculation.

meanings.sent1: The miscomputes in the report led to confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: We found several miscomputes in the financial statements.
meanings.sent3: The miscomputes in the recipe made the cake taste strange.
meanings.sent4: His miscomputes were like puzzle pieces that didn't fit together.
meanings.sent5: The miscomputes in the data caused errors in the analysis.
